index.description: a numeric number representing block index, 0 is the genesis block

author.description: the address of the person who authored this block

difficulty.description: the difficulty level used in computing this block

prevBlockHash.description: the hash of the previous block on the chain

timestamp.description: a UNIX timestamp of when this block was mined

token_transactions.description: an array of token transactions that occured in this block

completed_shards.description: an array of shards which were completed and incorporated into this block
